lessons.name: Syllogistic Arguments - How to Star
lessons.description: Syllogistic Arguments - How to star will test you knowledge of the star test.

forms.form:
Which letters are distributed here?
Treat like letters as if they were different.

	All ${letter_1} is ${letter_2}
	____
∴	____

answerForms.form: Neither letter is distributed
Just the first letter is distributed
Just the second letter is distributed
Both letters are distributed

forms.form:

Just the second letter is distributed
